title: Skild AI raises $1.4B to build ‘omni-bodied’ robot brain
description:
Skild AI has received investment from SoftBank, NVIDIA, Bezos Expeditions, and more as it builds a brain to operate any robot.

The post Skild AI raises $1.4B to build ‘omni-bodied’ robot brain appeared first on The Robot Report.
